name: thompson2026
description: Nicholas Thompson's 2026 California gubernatorial campaign website

scripts.build: rimraf _site dist && postcss styles/main.css -o dist/styles.min.css && npx @11ty/eleventy && node scripts/download-pdf-lib.js && node scripts/localize-fa-icons.js && purgecss --config purgecss.config.cjs && node scripts/strip-exif.js && node scripts/localize-external-images.js && node scripts/localize-external-scripts.js && node scripts/fingerprint-assets.js && node scripts/purge-per-page.js && node scripts/inline-small-css.js && node scripts/fix-blog-thumbs.js && node scripts/precompress.js
scripts.build:clean: rimraf _site dist && postcss styles/main.css -o dist/styles.min.css && npx @11ty/eleventy && node scripts/download-pdf-lib.js && node scripts/localize-fa-icons.js && purgecss --config purgecss.config.cjs && node scripts/strip-exif.js && node scripts/localize-external-images.js && node scripts/localize-external-scripts.js && node scripts/fingerprint-assets.js && node scripts/purge-per-page.js && node scripts/inline-small-css.js && node scripts/fix-blog-thumbs.js && node scripts/precompress.js
scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development&& postcss styles/main.css -o dist/styles.min.css && npx @11ty/eleventy --serve
